content: Any time his icy attacks create a frost field, you'll need to evacuate quickly from the affected area, or you'll rapidly become chilled and eventually immobile while your stamina is sapped.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
Any time his icy attacks create a frost field, you'll need to evacuate quickly from the affected area, or you'll rapidly become chilled and eventually immobile while your stamina is sapped.
